pullrequest.title: First part of MassMatrix3 class, mostly accessors and modifiers

content.raw: Yes, Ian and I have seen similar issues with coverage of destructors. To help coverage, add a test where the destructor called from a "delete" as well as the stack. I found that for my test, I had to create an instance with new and call delete on it, otherwise it would not get covered. If that doesn't fix it, you can try to declare the destructor explicitely if you are relying on the compiler's one.
content.html: Yes, Ian and I have seen similar issues with coverage of destructors. To help coverage, add a test where the destructor called from a "delete" as well as the stack. I found that for my test, I had to create an instance with new and call delete on it, otherwise it would not get covered. If that doesn't fix it, you can try to declare the destructor explicitely if you are relying on the compiler's one.
